effects: Dodge 2 physical attacks for 3 turns to caster

Gain access to following skills for one turn:
	Super Dog Attack - Earth (220930)
	Super Dog Attack - Light (220940)
name: Afterimage Technique

desc_short.0:
Enable self to dodge most physical attacks 2 times and enable super dog attack - earth and
super dog attack - light for one turn
desc_short.5: Puede esquivar la mayoría de los ataques físicos 2 veces y aprende Superataque canino - Tierra y Superataque canino - Luz durante 1 turno
